page.title: 16IND COOPE CLUB
page.content: This club is situated in the built up area of Horninglow.It is a sports and social club for the use of the brewery workers,their sons and daughters.There are 3 bowling greens,one with floodlights ,where matches are played several times per week throughout the season.Members can use the 2 snooker tables for a 5 pounds deposit for the cues and balls and 10p. for 10mins. lighting.There are 3 main cricket teams and several departmental teams.On 2.6.85 a team played a charity match against a show business side called the 'Lord's Taverners'.There are tennis and squash courts,rifle range,slot machines and a pool table.The main hall is used for parties and other entertainments and is marked out for badminton.Members can buy subsidised drinks and snacks.
